name: Picnic Invader
description:
My first infinite runner game. Supports gamepad and keyboard controls.

Definitely still some bugs in there and a couple features got left behind, but I'm quite satisfied with the current state of the project. Took 1 week to build. I sort of went for a retro 8/16 bit theme (because it's easy when you suck at art like me). It's not true to either of those, but it is all 8-bit sound effects and pixel art. 

The music is mostly by users nene and Wolfgang of opengameart. Everything else (except for a couple sound effects) are made by me.
https://opengameart.org/users/nene
https://opengameart.org/users/wolfgang
